title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: It was an insightful session on Twitter spaces of Polygon and AdLunam team. They have discussed all things related to the project and how polygon is changing the industry with their unique propositions.Learn more here and join the AdLunam Waitlist:https://adlunam.cc/adlunam-waitlist/￼Projects: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1tsXIyJf6NPDTyizCRI9mnfla6BNSJwSfMHztnJPetgw/viewform?ts=62454d18&edit_requested=true￼Internships: https://forms.gle/1hJg1VyEVbL1zain7

comments.author: ANKIT007
comments.body: Polygon is streamlining its funding efforts by referring all grant initiatives across the ecosystem to the DAO. It will enable better coordination, management, and project tracking for Polygon DAO and partners. This initiative by Polygon Village will focus on educational sessions from Web3 experts. It will be a forum where new and emerging projects with unique use cases can present themselves in front of the entire Polygon community. The Polygon DAO will also announce monthly awards on the emerging dApps.
